emuInput.TitMainTitle: Men and women, including Prince "Big Blue" Bruce and Mrs. Bruce gathered around their son, John N. Bruce in U. S. Army uniform and holding little boy, in Bruce home, Rose Street
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "Feted on Furlough - Mr. and Mrs. Prince Bruce of Rose Street, gave a party for their son, Pfc. John N. Bruce, who is home on furlough.  He is stationed at Fresno, Calif. - Harris Photo."
